Class AccountDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccountDatabase
  • public class AccountDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    The AccountDatabase class is the container class that represents an account database as an array of items. Property of AccountDatabase is size. Methods associated with AccountDatabase are find, grow, add, remove, deposit, withdrawal sortByDateOpen, sortByLastName, printByDateOpen, printByLastName, and printAccounts
    Author:
    Joshua Atienza, Kyle Lee

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Account[] accounts  
      private int size  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AccountDatabase()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean add​(Account account)
      Adds specified Account to database Account is added in the next immediately available index
      boolean deposit​(Account account, double amount)
      Deposits a specified amount into a designated account
      private int find​(Account account)
      Finds a specific account in the database and returns its index in the array.
      private void grow()
      Grows the capacity of the database by copying over object references from old array to new array Capacity of the database increases by 5 when grow() is called
      void printAccounts()
      Prints the list of accounts in the database
      void printByDateOpen()
      Prints the list of accounts by the dates they were opened Includes starting balance and ending balance, with fees and interest
      void printByLastName()
      Prints the list of accounts by the last names of the holders Includes starting balance and ending balance, with fees and interest
      boolean remove​(Account account)
      Removes the specified Account from database Replaces the removing element with the last element, and size field decreases by 1
      private void sortByDateOpen()
      Perform selection sort on accounts in database Sort by the dates the accounts were opened
      private void sortByLastName()
      Perform selection sort on accounts in database Sort by the last names of the account holders
      int withdrawal​(Account account, double amount)
      Withdraws a specified amount from a designated account

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • accounts

        private Account[] accounts

      • size

        private int size

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountDatabase

        public AccountDatabase()

    • Method Detail

      • find

        private int find​(Account account)
        Finds a specific account in the database and returns its index in the array. Performs a linear search for the target account
        Parameters:
        account - The Account being searched for
        Returns:
        The index of the found account, -1 if item doesn't exist in database

      • grow

        private void grow()
        Grows the capacity of the database by copying over object references from old array to new array Capacity of the database increases by 5 when grow() is called

      • add

        public boolean add​(Account account)
        Adds specified Account to database Account is added in the next immediately available index
        Parameters:
        account - The Account being added to the database
        Returns:
        true if add successful, false otherwise

      • remove

        public boolean remove​(Account account)
        Removes the specified Account from database Replaces the removing element with the last element, and size field decreases by 1
        Parameters:
        account - The Account being removed from the database
        Returns:
        true if Account successfully removed, false otherwise

      • deposit

        public boolean deposit​(Account account,
                       double amount)
        Deposits a specified amount into a designated account
        Parameters:
        account - The Account being deposited into
        amount - The amount being deposited
        Returns:
        true if account exists and amount greater than 0, false otherwise

      • withdrawal

        public int withdrawal​(Account account,
                      double amount)
        Withdraws a specified amount from a designated account
        Parameters:
        account - The Account being withdrawn from
        amount - The amount being withdrawn
        Returns:
        0 if withdrawal successful, 1 if funds insufficient, -1 if account doesn't exist

      • sortByDateOpen

        private void sortByDateOpen()
        Perform selection sort on accounts in database Sort by the dates the accounts were opened

      • sortByLastName

        private void sortByLastName()
        Perform selection sort on accounts in database Sort by the last names of the account holders

      • printByDateOpen

        public void printByDateOpen()
        Prints the list of accounts by the dates they were opened Includes starting balance and ending balance, with fees and interest

      • printByLastName

        public void printByLastName()
        Prints the list of accounts by the last names of the holders Includes starting balance and ending balance, with fees and interest

      • printAccounts

        public void printAccounts()
        Prints the list of accounts in the database
